lex.text: Baymax was created by American @ Duncan Rouleau and Steven T. Seagle. Baymax is a character in Big Hero 6 which stars Alan Tudyk.
lex.template: AGENT-1 was created by PATIENT-1 @ BRIDGE-1 and PATIENT-3 . AGENT-1 is a character in BRIDGE-2 which stars PATIENT-2 .
